name: backend
description: exercises for part3 full stack open

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Full\ Stack\ Open\ Exercises/part2/thephonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../Full\ Stack\ Open\ Exercises\ part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
